set (SDL2_INCLUDE_DIRS 	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
	CACHE INTERNAL "SDL2 Include Dir")

set(SDL2_LIBRARIES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x86/SDL2.lib
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x86/SDL2main.lib
	CACHE INTERNAL "SDL2 Libs")
	
INSTALL(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x86/SDL2.dll
  DESTINATION bin)
